purpleculture_pinyin:
yuán
circle; round; circular; spherical; (of the moon) full; unit of Chinese currency (yuan); tactful; to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
круг; круглый; круговой; сферический; (луны) полная; единица китайской валюты (юань); тактичный; сделать последовательным и целостным (повествование о сне или лжи)

humanum_full_description_en:
" Yuan " is a later character, and its initial text is from the upper circle (the first text of "圆" is also the sound symbol of " member ", represented by ◎), and the lower part is " Ding ", see " member ". From "囗" to " member " sound, it means circle and ring. "Mozi·Fayi": "Bai Gong is the square and the rule, and the circle is the rule."

" Circle " also means completeness, fullness, and thoroughness. "Shuowen": "Quan Ye. From the 囗, the member's voice. The reading is like a member." "Lv Shi Chunqiu-Interrogation": "The ears are sparse and the ears are large, and the millet is round and thin." Gao You's note: "round , Plump too."

Things that look like a circle, such as balls and pills, can also be called " circles ." Tang Fengzhi's "Miscellaneous Notes of Yunxian‧Shenshui in the Bamboo Jie": "Leak and otter liver are rounded to treat diseases such as lump in the heart and belly."

" Circle " also means reunion. Song Xin Qiji "Magnolia Slow-Chuzhou Sends Fan Yan": "The situation refers to the Mid-Autumn Festival. It is a very good month, and it is not perfect for people."

" Round " also means roundness . Han Huankuan's "Salt, Iron, and Confucianism": "Confucius can be square but not round."
humanum_short_description_en: From "囗", the sound of " member " means circle and ring.
humanum_full_description:
「圓」屬較後起文字，其初文為上從圓形(「圓」的初文，亦是「員」的聲符，以◎表示)，下從「鼎」，參見「員」。從「囗」，「員」聲，表示圓周、環形。《墨子‧法儀》：「百工為方以矩，為圓以規。」

　　「圓」也表示完整、豐滿、周全。《說文》：「全也。从囗，員聲。讀若員。」 《呂氏春秋‧審時》：「疏穖而穗大，其粟圓而薄糠。」高誘注：「圓，豐滿也。」

　　形似圓形的東西，如球、丸，也可稱為「圓」。唐馮贄《雲仙雜記‧竹節中神水》：「瀝取和獺肝為圓，治心腹塊聚等疾。」

　　「圓」也表示團圓。宋辛棄疾〈木蘭花慢‧滁州送范倅〉：「況屈指中秋，十分好月，不照人圓。」

　　「圓」還表示圓滑。漢桓寬《鹽鐵論‧論儒》：「孔子能方不能圓。」
humanum_short_description: 從「囗」，「員」聲，表示圓周、環形。

①從中心點到周邊任何一點的距離都相等的形：圓形。圓圈。圓周。圓錐。圓柱。
②完備，周全：圓滿。圓全。
③使之周全：自圓其說。圓謊。圓場。
④占夢以決吉凶：圓夢。
⑤宛轉，滑利：圓滑。圓潤。
⑥運轉無礙：圓熟。圓通。
⑦貨幣單位。亦作“元”。
⑧姓氏。

「 圓 」屬較後起文字，其初文為上從圓形(「 圓 」的初文，亦是「 員 」的聲符，以◎表示)，下從「 鼎 」，參見「 員 」。從「 囗 」，「 員 」聲，表示圓周、環形。《墨子‧法儀》：「百工為方以矩，為圓以規。」 「 圓 」也表示完整、豐滿、周全。《說文》：「全也。从囗，員聲。讀若員。」 《呂氏春秋‧審時》：「疏穖而穗大，其粟圓而薄糠。」高誘注：「圓，豐滿也。」 形似圓形的東西，如球、丸，也可稱為「 圓 」。唐馮贄《雲仙雜記‧竹節中神水》：「瀝取和獺肝為圓，治心腹塊聚等疾。」 「 圓 」也表示團圓。宋辛棄疾〈木蘭花慢‧滁州送范倅〉：「況屈指中秋，十分好月，不照人圓。」 「 圓 」還表示圓滑。漢桓寬《鹽鐵論‧論儒》：「孔子能方不能圓。」
" Yuan" is a later character, and its initial text is from the upper circle (the first text of " 圆" is also the sound symbol of " member", represented by ◎), and the lower part is " Ding", see " member". From " 囗" to " member" sound, it means circle and ring. "Mozi·Fayi": "Bai Gong is the square and the rule, and the circle is the rule." " Circle" also means completeness, fullness, and thoroughness. "Shuowen": "Quan Ye. From the 囗, the member's voice. The reading is like a member." "Lv Shi Chunqiu-Interrogation": "The ears are sparse and the ears are large, and the millet is round and thin." Gao You's note: "round , Plump too." Things that look like a circle, such as balls and pills, can also be called " circles." Tang Fengzhi's "Miscellaneous Notes of Yunxian‧Shenshui in the Bamboo Jie": "Leak and otter liver are rounded to treat diseases such as lump in the heart and belly." " Circle" also means reunion. Song Xin Qiji "Magnolia Slow-Chuzhou Sends Fan Yan": "The situation refers to the Mid-Autumn Festival. It is a very good month, and it is not perfect for people." " Round" also means roundness. Han Huankuan's "Salt, Iron, and Confucianism": "Confucius can be square but not round."

圓字的基本解释

圓
yuán
见“圆”。

圓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》王權切，平仙，云。］
亦作“圎1”。“圆1”的繁体字。
(1)圆周；环形。
(2)形容近于环形的程度高。
(3)丸；球。
(4)指天。
(5)谓运转无碍。
(6)指处世的圆滑。
(7)丰满；饱满。
(8)指充满，满盈。
(9)完满，圆满。
(10)引申指完毕，终结。
(11)美满。
(12)保全；周全。
(13)完整。
(14)指使完整。
(15)圆润；滑利。
(16)婉转，委婉。
(17)圆熟。
(18)团圆。
(19)墨及钱币等圆形物单位名，后专指货币，并不受圆形的限制。
(20)我国本位货币也用圆。一圆等于十角或一百分。简写作“元”。
(21)用同“原”。推究，解释。
(22)旋转。参见“圓轉”、“圓旋”。
(23)围。参见“圓坐”。
(24)量词。指称圆形物。
(25)佛教语。不偏倚。

圓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　圓； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页220第09
【唐韻】王權切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】于權切，?音員。與圜同。方之對也。【說文】圜，全也。【韻會】古方圓之圓皆作圜，今皆作圓。【易·繫辭】蓍之德圓而神，卦之德方以智。【管子·心術篇】能大圓者，體乎大方。【韓非子·飾邪篇】左手畫圓，右手畫方，不能兩全。【郭璞·江賦】圓淵九迴而懸騰。【註】峽江深急，激岸石而成圓流也。【元結·惡圓論歌】寧方爲皁，不圓爲卿。寧方爲汙辱，不圓爲顯榮。　又圓夢，占夢以決吉凶也。【秦再思紀異錄】長安興義寺有圓夢堂，禪師智滿，圓夢獲驗，堂因以名。　又與員同。【孟子】規矩方員之至也。【詩·商頌】景員維河。【說文長箋】員當作圓，言周景山皆大河也。　又與卵同。【山海經】丹山之陽，有鳳之圓。【緯略】圓，古卵字。【正字通】經本作丸，緯略因聲近，譌爲圓。　又【集韻】王問切，音運。義同。　又叶于分切，音雲。【蔡洪·圍棋賦】曲直有正，方而不圓。算徒授卒，三百維羣。円えん、￥（YEN），同圓。

round

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guangyun" King Power Cut, Pingxian, Cloud. ]
Also known as "圎1". Traditional characters for "圆1".
(1) Circumference; ring shape.
(2) Describes a high degree of close to ring shape.
(3) Pill; ball.
(4) Refers to the sky.
(5) It is said that the operation is not hindered.
(6) Refers to the smoothness of life.
(7) Fullness; fullness.
(8) Refers to fullness, fullness.
(9) Complete and complete.
(10) The extension refers to the end and the end.
(11) Happy.
(12) Preservation; comprehensive.
(13) Complete.
(14) Instruct to complete.
(15) Round; smooth.
(16) Tactfully, euphemistically.
(17) Well-rounded.
(18) Reunion.
(19) The unit names of round objects such as ink and coins, which later refer exclusively to currency, are not restricted by the round shape.
(20) Our country's standard currency also uses the Yuan. A circle is equal to ten horns or one hundred points. The abbreviation is "yuan".
(21) Use the same as "original". Examine, explain.
(22) Rotation. See "circular rotation", "circular rotation".
(23) Wai. See "Round Sitting".
(24) Quantifiers. Refers to round objects.
(25) Buddhist language. Unbiased.
round
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [囗字部] 　圆; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 220 09
[Tang Yun] Wang Quanqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Yu Quanqie, sound member. Same as 圜. That's right. [Said the text] Won, everything. [Rhyme Club] In ancient times, all circles were round, but now they are round. [Yi·Ci] The virtues of the yarrow are round and divine, and the virtues of the hexagram are wise. 【Pipe·Heart Technique】Those who can make great rounds are generous in body. [Han Feizi·Xie Xie Chapter] Draw a circle with the left hand and a square with the right hand. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Yuanyuan hangs over nine times. [Note] The Gorge River is deep and rapid, and the rocks form a circular stream. 【Yuan Jie·Evil Roundness Song】Ning Fang is soap, but not round is Qing. Ning Fang is insulting, and not being round is honoring.　The dream has come true again, and the dream can be used to determine good or bad. [Qin Zai Si Ji Yi Lu] Chang'an Xingyi Temple has a dream hall, the Zen master is wise, and the dream is verified, and the hall is named after it.　The same as the member again. [Mencius] The rules are the best. 【Poetry·Commercial Song】Scenario Weihe. [Said Wen Changjian] The member is regarded as a circle, saying that Zhou Jingshan is a big river.　 Same with the egg again. [Shanhaijing] The sun of Danshan has the circle of phoenix. 【Weilue】round, ancient egg word. 【Zhengzitong】The scriptures are used as pills, the latitude is slightly close, and the sulcus is round.　[Jiyun] Wang Wenqi, sound luck. The same meaning.　Leaves in slitting again, sound cloud. [Caihong·Go Fu] The straight and straight, square but not round. Calculated as a student, a three-hundred-dimensional group.円えん, ￥(YEN), same circle.
